sense.gloss: the harmonizing, mentally and physically, of two parties engaged in an activity, singing from the same hymn-sheet, dancing to the same beat
Aun, Om, syllable representing the primordial trinity of Vishnu, Shiva and Brahma
alpha and omega, inspiration and expiration, respiration
closed-mouthed form (statue with closed mouth, symbolizing the "um" half of "aum")

sense.l: san: a vi ra hūṃ khaṃ

sdata.j: ↑阿吽↑↓あうん↓の↑呼吸↑↓こきゅう↓で↑事↑↓こと↓を↑進↑↓すす↓める↑彼↑↓かれ↓らが↑羨↑↓うらや↓ましい。
sdata.e: I find it enviable that they are able to progress in such harmony.
